mapper.select: select a.artist_id, (select name from tb_user where user_id = a.artist_id) artist_name, a.sentence, a.file_group_seq, a.upload_date, a.painting_id, a.posted_num, a.posted_people_cnt from tb_painting a, (select painting_id from tb_purchase where to_days(now()) - to_days(purchase_date) <= 120 group by painting_id) b where a.painting_id = b.painting_id and a.painting_status = #{paintingStatus} order by posted_num desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
